body_html:
Could not reproduce with

nvidia-docker run -it nvidia/cuda:9.0-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu16.04 /bin/bash
# in docker
apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl python-dev python-setuptools
curl -O https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/11/b6/abcb525026a4be042b486df43905d6893fb04f05aac21c32c638e939e447/pip-9.0.1.tar.gz
tar zxf pip-9.0.1.tar.gz
pushd pip-9.0.1
python setup.py install
popd
rm -rf pip-9.0.1*
pip install --no-cache --upgrade-strategy only-if-needed torch_nightly -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu90/torch_nightly.html
pip install numpy
python -c 'import torch'
body_text:
Could not reproduce with
nvidia-docker run -it nvidia/cuda:9.0-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu16.04 /bin/bash
# in docker
apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl python-dev python-setuptools
curl -O https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/11/b6/abcb525026a4be042b486df43905d6893fb04f05aac21c32c638e939e447/pip-9.0.1.tar.gz
tar zxf pip-9.0.1.tar.gz
pushd pip-9.0.1
python setup.py install
popd
rm -rf pip-9.0.1*
pip install --no-cache --upgrade-strategy only-if-needed torch_nightly -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu90/torch_nightly.html
pip install numpy
python -c 'import torch'
body:
Could not reproduce with
```
nvidia-docker run -it nvidia/cuda:9.0-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu16.04 /bin/bash
# in docker
apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl python-dev python-setuptools
curl -O https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/11/b6/abcb525026a4be042b486df43905d6893fb04f05aac21c32c638e939e447/pip-9.0.1.tar.gz
tar zxf pip-9.0.1.tar.gz
pushd pip-9.0.1
python setup.py install
popd
rm -rf pip-9.0.1*
pip install --no-cache --upgrade-strategy only-if-needed torch_nightly -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu90/torch_nightly.html
pip install numpy
python -c 'import torch'
```
